Instance.description: Social mixer interaction with the specific functionality to throw an object between Sims.

TunableVariant.name: social_group_scoring
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, the thrower and target of this group will have an additional score to be the next person that generates the social adjustment. The higher the value, the more likely they will move after this mixer has ran.

TunableTuple.name: enabled
TunableTuple.description: Thrower and target tuning to affect the adjustment scoring.

Tunable.name: receiver_score
Tunable.description: Score to be added on the weight the receiver of this mixer to be more likely to move on the next social adjustment.

Tunable.name: thrower_score
Tunable.description: Score to be added on the weight the thrower of this mixer to be more likely to move on the next social adjustment.

TunableVariant.name: throw_impact_data
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, the object thrown will trigger a reaction at a specific timing of the throw on the target. If disabled, throw will happen but target will not react.

TunableTuple.name: enabled
TunableTuple.description: Specific tuning defining the target reaction.

Tunable.name: asm_state_name
Tunable.description: State name that will be called on the ASM of the mixer when the impact happens.

Tunable.name: destroy_event_id
Tunable.description: Id number of the event the for the thrown object to be destroyed. By default, ballistic controller has an event at 668 at the end of the throw, unless animation requests it, that should be used.

Tunable.name: event_id
Tunable.description: Id number of the event the ballistic controller will throw to trigger the reaction.

Tunable.name: event_timing_offset
Tunable.description: Offset in seconds when the event_id should trigger with reference to the ending of the throw. This means that a value of 0.2 will trigger this event 0.2 seconds before the object thrown hits its target.

TunableVariant.name: impact_effect
TunableVariant.description: When enabled, effect will play on the thrown object position at the time given by event_timing_offset. Effect will not be parented, this is to trigger effects like a snowball explosion etc.

Tunable.name: effect_name
Tunable.description: The name of the effect to play.

TunableVariant.name: joint_name
TunableVariant.description: Specify if the visual effect is attached to a slot and, if so, which slot.

Tunable.name: Slot
Tunable.description: The name of the slot this effect is attached to.

Tunable.name: play_immediate
Tunable.description: If checked, this effect will be triggered immediately, nothing will block. ex. VFX will be played immediately while the Sim is routing or animating.

TunableList.name: impact_offset
TunableList.description: Offsets for the impact position by age of the target Sim.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: Age for which this offset should be applied.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: Offset from the impact position where the ballistic controller should aim the object. For example, for an impact on a Sims feet, offset should be (0,0,0), but if we want a miss or another part we may want to push it higher.
